params.buyPoolFee: Pool fee tier for buy swap (used to build calldata on-chain)
params.buyRouter: Router to buy WMON with USDC (lower price)
params.minProfit: Minimum WMON profit required (reverts if not met)
params.minWmonOut: Minimum WMON output for slippage protection on buy swap
params.sellRouter: Router to sell WMON for USDC (higher price)

executeArbUnchecked(uint8,bytes,uint8,ui.details: Only ensures both swaps succeed atomically. Monitor should check profitability.

executeArb(uint8,bytes,uint8,uint24,uint.notice: Execute atomic arbitrage: WMON -> USDC -> WMON (with profit check)

executeArbUnchecked(uint8,bytes,uint8,ui.notice: Execute atomic arbitrage WITHOUT profit check (for testing)

setupApprovals().notice: Setup max approvals for all routers (call once after deployment)
